기능 명세서

Table of Contents

  • 기능 명세서

    • 기능

      • Recording

      • Snapshot

      • Storage

    • 운영체제

기능

Recording

  • Resolution: 1280x720@25fps

  • Video Codec: MPEG-4 ( H.264 )

Snapshot

  • Resolution: 1280x720

  • Compression Format: JPEG

Storage

  • SD Card

    • Capacity: 2GB ~ 2TB

    • Video Speed Class: V30 ( 30MB/s, 4K )

운영체제

  • Windows ( X64 & ARM64 )

  • MacOS ( Monterey 12 and later )

  • Linux

  • Android ( EDS NG )

  • iOS ( Disk Decipher, Crypto Disks )
